        public void login(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  boolean newUser,
                  java.lang.String host,
                  java.lang.Boolean isRMI,
                  int objectPort,
                  int requestPort)
        To try a login to the server
        Parameters:
        name - contains user'name
        password - contains user's password
        newUser - to communicate if user has to sign up
        host - IP address
        isRMI - boolean value contains the type of connection
        objectPort - contains the object port number
        requestPort - contains the request port number
